bow: did expect to have to watch one of the kids alone said my husband after night of camping and day of fishing my husband went camping with coworkers friday night right after work so we did see him at all that day then he came back around super exhausted and wanting to sleep was not happy about that but let him anyway my daughter went to birthday party with my mom and the hubs was happy about it because he wanted to spend time with her but she was ready so she went an hour or two after they left she called and wanted me to come so woke the hubs up he was happy so once was there she wanted to wait for the piñata and cake which took like three hours he was happy so he says you knew was really tired did expect to watch the kids by myself oh my goodness he felt entitled to rest after night of drinking and day of fishing am within reason of being pissed at his attitude anyone else deal with this kind of view sure you have right to be upset but if you guys agreed for him to go out and drink fish what wrong with him getting appropriate rest in our house we both like to go out with friends so we take turns knowing that the other will take primary role of toddler wrangler and we re okay with it if this is pattern and you do get to go out with your friends then yea it definitely something to talk to him about understand how you feel maybe it not right because technically he does need rest because he had none but when my hubs does stuff like this is because there have been so many times ve been tired not from partying and just had to suck it up and make lunch anyway it little like the sahm thing which am know he tired when he gets home from work and know he works hard but did exactly sit on my ass all day either and want ten minutes to go take poo or sit in my room and read for minute it not that have stuff need to do but would like sec for just me even he gets 40 minute ride home from work with the radio on ca make pediatrician appointment without ninja skills and distractions not trying to start anything between moms and dads just stating how feel when things like this happen in my marriage then calm down remember the times he shaved my legs for me when was too preggo to bend let alone sit in our tub and remember that he does do very much besides work without his family if my hubby had gone somewhere with his buddies it would have been rare occurrence not because keep him locked up but because more times than not he prefers to be with us probably just let it go let him sleep this once and use it as bartering tool later totally understand you re pissed totally would be too and not saying would do this with smile but would do it only remind him how awesome was few dozen times good luck this sounds like something you should have been something you guys talked about before he went understand your annoyance but sure he honestly did expect to have to watch the kids by himself when he got home next time something like this happens maybe he gets to rest when he gets home but you get to do something special the next weekend so you both get mini vacations have this issue with my husband often he will be gone all day doing something fun and then is worn out and angry if want him to do parenting things it is funny that your husband cranked that your daughter was leaving because he wanted to see her and yet what he wanted to do was sleep did he want her to stay home from the party and just be in the house sleeping while he slept honestly try not to feel angry and bitter about this attitude have right to feel angry and bitter have reason to feel angry and bitter am entitled to feel angry and bitter the problem the only thing was left with was feeling angry and bitter my bad feelings did change him all they did was make me feel bad again when this stuff happens have right reason and am entitled to feel angry and bitter but feeling that way hurts and am sick of it so try not to wallow there now try and ask in advance if am going to need him and try to plan for those times to be when my son will be fresh and easy to deal with try to have everything that might be needed available and write note with details about snacks meals drinks potty issues activities he might set my son up with and so on if my need to ask him to do solo care of my son is unexpected often point out few activities and snacks that my son enjoys and have things he likes set aside to keep the novelty fresh should have to do all this no do know woman who have partners who assume that often and unanticipated care of the children alone is part of it all and regularly care for their kids without getting bent out of shape yep do get jealous and bitter and feel like why not me why do deserve that partner you bet do two of my sisters have husbands who are thousand times more involved fathers than my husband but did get super dad got my husband whom love and who has many other fine qualities but gets childish and irritable and sometimes even mean about unanticipated responsibility for my son so try to avoid surprising him and deal with certain amount of jerkiness when it is unavoidable so having been there and done that you have all of my sympathy hundred fold and you are within reason to be pissed but try and not live in that feeling if you can because it is an ugly place that hurts you and you deserve to feel good glad not the only one not glad that someone else has to deal with this too though my friends husband are like yours too do all the preparations too trying so hard not to dwell so frustrated though how do get over it it sounds like you were both little on edge to begin with based on the number of times you used the phrase not happy perhaps no matter how any of these situations were handled was going to satisfy both of you because there was an irritable predisposition there what mean is you re irritated that he went out drinking he hungover and you began reacting to each other bad attitudes my husband and accidentally slip into these cycles sometimes and ca figure out why we re even being so pissy with each other in the first place usually it matter of suck it up and snap out of it for me he parent he should feel obligated to be as responsible for those children as you are it is always fun or easy as you know tough luck for him would be ok with it if that how it was my night out consists of crafting or doing our nails at someone house which is fun but am expected to be home by 10 get up with the kids while he sleeps in and usually the kids are asleep half the time he watches them you are right he is bad guy just priorities are messed up he did sleep for over an hour mini vacation ha ha ha wish he would never let me stay out passed 11 let alone drink it was planned for me to leave but had to get my daughter did let him sleep one day when was stewing on some issues about feeling as if parent alone got really dark for me more dark than can express it also happened to be day where my husband was going to be gone the entire day but was coming home for one hour was all twisted up and miserable and just was sick and tired of feeling so horrible decided that the only person suffering was me and even though had good reason to feel the way did just could bear it anymore and was going to take charge of my feelings and do whatever it would take to feel peace regardless of how entitled was to feel otherwise on that day put on my smile changed my clothes styled my hair and make up to look decent and pushed my son in his car to the park texted my husband that we were looking forward to the time we had to be together in the midst of his busy day and would enjoy it if he met us at the park went from feeling like was in hell to feeling pretty good and in charge my husband did meet us at the park and had him snap pic of me and my son the picture came out gorgeous and am not photogenic so it ends up being picture cherish because not only do look good but see it as reminder that decided that day that was going to take charge of my happiness no matter the circumstance and that was going to do whatever could to help my son have the best dad my husband could be by accepting who my husband is rather than who wish he was wish could say that made the decision not to be bitter once and never struggled again that would be lie the decision to be happy and do what it takes to stay that way has to be renewed often for me looking at that picture helps also wrote letter to myself reminding myself of all the things my husband does that are fantastic that look at when am focused on his attitude about parenting also sometimes imagine not having his help at all and how hard that would be mean even though have to prep him well can trust him to do it and know women who do have any help who ca so much as go out for coffee without struggling to find volunteer or forking over wads of cash to sitter also try to remember important areas that am poor at where my husband shoulders more of the burden and how he does act bitter and mean about my shortcomings my husband is the social gatherer in our relationship for instance try to love my husband for who he is not who wish he was and try to view the extra prepping he needs to be good dad as loving gesture rather than martyrdom anyway am rambling and maybe not making sense the tl dr one day said enough is enough and took responsibility for my happiness and decided would do whatever it took to feel peace often have to remind myself about that resolve but it is worth it it happens to us all from time to time let you you are an adult and do not have to get permission from anyone to do what you want to do as loving parent and part of parenting team you do have responsibility to make sure your kids are adequately cared for and that your partner is aware and able to care for them in your absence or find other care if he can not your husband does not give you permission any more than you give him permission to go out ll step off my soapbox now have this same problem with my husband and have had to work really hard to find ways to fix the problem changing my perspective and vocabulary has helped me lot wow thank you will try doing this cause feel like at my wits end be pissed with his attitude as well donno guess my mind set is welp welcome to fucking parenthood does it suck that he tired yes it does but you know us moms we re tired but we suck down some caffeine and get through the god damn day it the sacrifices we make you re welcome wits end is terrible place but it can be great place to grow from too seriously the roll over and take it method is not for me be putting his ass back in his place he helped you make those babies and now he needs to step the f*ck up and help take care of them being parent is being tired get over it put your big boy britches on and step up dude would be pissed off too if my hubs is ill hes in bed all day until hes better and if in ill chug counter drugs and do everything as usual through haze god forbid want to go out have to choose one of the children to take and then come back to them having watched dora all day and had macdonalds for lunch and nothing tidied up today actually got day out alone hopefully sign of things to come though there was still nothing done in the house gt but am expected to be home by 10 get up with the kids while he sleeps in why why does he get night and day off but you have to be home by 10 that is inspiring and very helpful thank you for sharing this it sounds like there larger issue in your marriage of not equitable down time freedom and responsibility if your needs were being met you would be as bitter about your husband having some time you also need to set an expectation of how you expect to be treated and what will make you happy in your relationship this is symptom do attack him for going out and not jumping right up to take care of the kids but talk about how you need some time too and help with responsibilities further expectations do make big difference and it hard for some people to just wing it when those expectations do fit reality almost always wake up with my daughter on weekends while the so sleeps in because get up early sometimes ask him to so can get break and he does it because do it most days however he asked me to let him know the night before when that happens so he prepared but do always know how ll feel in the morning those types of situations are difficult oh well then you should *definitely* be mad you guys should be trading off its not fair to think that he should get breaks but you should why should you get to drink or stay out or have spa day deleted try to remind myself you ca help how you feel but you do have power over how you respond to those feelings ha ha that why make sure have at least one or two good friends with husbands and kids so we can occasionally get together and bitch about the bad things and then feel better that everyone feels the same way and then realize that we do have it so bad after all this kind of attitude would make me so angry you are totally justified in your feelings this is the 1950 in my book dads are expected to be full time parents no different than mom my husband is all in 100 and if he were would have huge huge problem with that get previous poster do make yourself miserable by being mad attitude but that would be total last resort for me and probably steps ahead of my divorce could not live with inequity like that in partnership no matter how hard tried this kind of parenting by fathers perpetuates the stereotype of dad as babysitter instead of parent if were in your shoes it be time for serious come to jesus talk good luck yeah it tough to say without more information if this is self imposed thing or husband imposed thing it think if she asks for reciprocal treatment night out with friends and extra rest the next day and is denied then this is big problem but it could also be case of the op expecting herself to get home and get up the next morning because her husband does step in and offer to let her rest and if there one thing ve learned from marriage raising kids it that husbands are always willfully withholding help sometimes as baffling as it may seem they just do realize when help is needed unless they re explicitly asked you might be right but it hard for me to imagine grown person being unable to figure out how to pour cereal or get kid dressed get that child rearing does come easily to some men but that no excuse *i woman and terrible with babies thank god my husband was good with them since we had one if someone has the dad title then they need to do the dad job that goes along with it stepped up to be better mom he can step up to be better dad he has to prove to his kids that they can count on him just like they know they can count on mom *it not just for her sake it also for the sake of dad and the kids you need to sit him down once the kids are in bed sometime in the next day or two but definitely before the next weekend and explain that you want to talk about adult time say that you think it should be an equal amount between the two of you and that if he expects to get time to recuperate after night out with friends then you deserve the same thing my husband and take turns being the one to wake up with our annoyingly early bird children on the weekends if take saturday he takes sunday this lets us each sleep in if he tries to pull some bullshit answer like work and all you do is stay home with the kids all day every day tell him you ll be going to spend the weekend at your parents house this next weekend so that he can get the full experience of being just home alone with the kids every day hate when hear about husbands or wives with sahd pulling that bs it depends if ask my husband to watch our son in the morning while take shower sometimes that all get if ask him explicitly to feed our son breakfast and get him dressed while take shower that what get do think that makes him bad dad part of it is he genuinely does realize what needs to be done and part of it is he does do some things without asking me because had habit of getting pissed off when things did get done right trying to be better about that it frustrates me to no end that he does always consider breakfast or clothes or morning schedules but then he never refuses to do those things if ask him to that would be the real red flag you nailed it thanks gt because had habit of getting pissed off when things did get done right rock meet hard place do you think he is scared to parent not so much scared that he will screw up but that you will think that he screwed up somehow *you know does want to let you down it frustrates me to no end that he does always consider breakfast or clothes or morning schedules but then he never refuses to do those things if ask him to that would be the real red flag very true that would frustrate me too every situation is different and every relationship is different so there no one size fits all answer to this question good luck good husband is worth the trouble your responses are amazing thank you so much the thought process can be applied to couple different problems in my life regarding my husband especially the mindset of doing prep out of love for him an for your son anyway thank you for the new perspective this once in the morning went out for run and said child has doctor appointment at time which was about an hour from when was leaving thought that translated perfectly to so please feed her breakfast and change her clothes so can come home take quick shower and be off was so ticked when came home and she was still in her jammies watching cartoons husband saw me and jumped up to leave and just stared after him with my mouth open after getting over being mad which took while asked him why he did do those things and he said you did ask me to have learned that with my husband at least have to be very specific if want it done no it not fair but that how it is oh wow actually going to save this post and re read it when having bad day thank you have felt the imbalance many times do complain much at least try not to my husband works overnights and day shifts at café so when had really hard night and baby wakes up before the crack of dawn just take it but when all hear is how he rubbing it in we re all tired we re all worn out it annoying to hear complaints you yourself have to hold in hopefully you can level soon but if you need to swear at the dishes while washing them been at home all day mentality have slept in in months he stopped letting me cause he was too tired know never wish him away grass is always greener but at the end of the day grass is grass ca believe how well you just described my husband he ll go off on motorcycle ride for hours while my son is in prime awake time then will come back just when he goes down for nap giving him about hours of rest then if want to go for motorcycle ride or need to shop or go get haircut or whatever he says you should go while he napping or you should go when he in bed you know so he inconvenienced for shorter just complaining about it makes the work easier and that when you accidentally let the kids wake him up or see huge spider that make you scream or whatever then if he complains too much about being tired say okay ll make you an appointment with the doctor if you re this tired because there must be something medically wrong with you if you re feeling like that while getting so much more sleep than me you re his wife not the nanny he needs to keep up with his side of parenting just as much as you do that includes giving you as many breaks as you give him whether he likes it or not all parents of young children are tired he needs to grow up and realize that it just for this little while and you deserve just as much consideration as he does yes my poor husband works weird shift when with the guys happy for him to get the opportunity but also remind him that he has to be father the next day and that will be planning spa dinner with my best friend the following week it makes him feel better prepared for what role he plays and do feel left out reading this made me inspired to apply this logic to other areas of our life as well what refreshing and inspiring take on things
